ygData.subject: Re: Hidden spells
ygData.msgSnippet: has anyone else noticed the extra wizard portals lying around?  i ve been just stumbling upon them left and right.  one of my orignal complaints about the
ygData.messageBody:
has anyone else noticed the extra wizard portals lying around? i've
been just stumbling upon them left and right. one of my orignal
complaints about the wizard class is that we're outmatched by druid's
teleportation spells...but i've seen portal points in south ro and south
karana..i'd imagine that there's one in nearly every area just waiting
to be discovered via questing or perhaps experimentation with runes. i
personally am considering getting some extra cash together and visiting
the vendor in sro that gives out scrolls for 5pp. sure i may not get
anything, but i figure that i at least have a chance at getting
something useful. would be neat to get a "portal: sro" or some such.

--
[ Timothy Whitman ] [ uin: 6508449 ] [ timothy@... ]
[ "Pessimism is the only practical, realistic way to look at life" ]
